Title: Concluding remarks
Abstract: © Springer International Publishing AG 2017.Some examples, as an echo of the discussion about the source of complexity in Chap. 1 at the beginning of the book, are presented to further confirm the complexity of the systems considered in this book. Some suggestions for future work are presented. It is shown that study of complex control systems is a long term task for researchers and control engineers.
